short_summary: Metal Storage Pallet Warehouse Racking DND - North Bay
full_summary:
**Metal Storage Pallet Warehouse Racking – North Bay**
==========

*Tender Reference Number*: WS4338143586
*Tender Amendment Number*: 1
*Solicitation Number*: WS4338143586
*Tender Status*: Cancelled
==========

**Issuing Authority**
--------------------

* **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Jessica Canas (elle-la / she-her)
* **Email**: [jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Overview**
-------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) at North Bay is seeking proposals for Metal Storage Pallet Warehouse Racking.

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
**Region of Opportunity**: Ontario (except NCR)
**Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except NCR)

**Tender Details**
-----------------

* **Tender Closing Date**: December 28, 2023, 02:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 5, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2024
* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18208582?extsite=MTgyMDg1ODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18208582?extsite=MTgyMDg1ODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Notice**
--------

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 28, 2023, at 02:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after 02:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
